A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Having a hard time understanding how anyone could give this garbage more than one star.  Huge SW fan at 44 years old.  This movie ended any more interest I have in Disney's version of Star Wars.  As far as I'm concerned TFA and TLJ are fan fiction.  I like the Prequels for the most part.  I'm pretty easy to please.  But Disney's desire to destroy the Original Trilogy with the events of these new movies boggles the mind.
